name: VIII. “RITUAL”
description:
8/8 from “Nightmares” collection.
It’s a collection created to celebrate Halloween that revives the most common and darkest nightmares that haunt the human being. 8 collectible card amulets that explain the most terrifying fears and give protection to those who have them.

Description of the piece:
If we dream about a witchcraft ritual, which we are not practicing or anyone we recognize, it means that we want to achieve by any means the things that we think we deserve. If in the dream we see that someones do witchcraft to another person, it could be interpreted as the desire to punish others for some damage they have done to you.
Dreaming that you practice an act of witchcraft for a good purpose means that you like to help people and is an omen of luck and blessings. 
But if you dream about known people practicing black magic, it means that they could be hurting you or someone else. If you are the victim of witchcraft it means that your own decisions will hurt yourself. Possibly you are choosing the wrong path, living with toxic people, getting involved in a problematic relationship or maybe you are being manipulated by someone.

1157x1600px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/nightmares
